entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
